output_list.reason: The transfer of the lottery's contract to the winner's wallet creates an integer overflow.
The logic used to determine the winner's position is incorrect.
The random number generator used to distribute prizes is biased towards certain numbers.
The contract allows only the owner to set the betting conditions, retrieve user guesses and declare the winner.
The contract name is spelled incorrectly.
The value of the lottery's contract is not fixed, allowing the owner to set arbitrary prices.
